testcase.name: Validate Authentication External Login API with valid credentials for multiple user
testcase.system-out: Given I enter username as "mob_user_2" and password as "Maersk@6"...........passed When I send a POST request for Authentication External Login API with given credentials.passed Then I verify the status as "200" for given credentials.....................passed And I verify the result for Authentication External Login API as "SUCCESS" with given credentials.passed And I want to get token_id from response of Authentication External Login API with given credentials.passed

testcase.name: Validate Refresh Token Login API for successful token generation with a valid CustomerCode
testcase.system-out: Given I have a valid token_id and CustomerCode as "10000007951".............passed When I send a POST request for Refresh Token Login API endpoint with token_id and the CustomerCode in the request body.passed Then I verify the status as "200" for given credentials.....................passed And I want to get id_token from response of Refresh Token Login API with given credentials.passed
